nodes.text: Lugjack was a game of chance popular in many star systems. A lugjack machine was a credit-operated stand-alone device with three or more reels that rotated when a player pulled a lever located on the side of the machine. It typically paid off based on patterns of symbols visible on the front of the machine when it stopped.
The Tralla Room on the Coral Vanda had a range of lugjack bars, and the Casino Kuari on board the Kuari Princess had lugjack among its games.
